rooms.description: A large room where the breach occurred. Armored men and weapons are present.  Intruders lie on the floor.
rooms.image_prompt: A spaceship interior showing a large room with armored soldiers surrounding several large, pale, naked humanoid figures with large heads and dark red skin. The room is dimly lit, and there's a large hole in one wall covered by a fleshy membrane.
rooms.name: Breach Point
rooms.canon_event: The breach point room is where alien intruders, resembling amphibian-like humanoids, emerged from a pressure-sealed membrane.  A firefight ensues between the intruders and Sol Guards in zero gravity after the intruders attack.  The battle ends with the intruders escaping into space and a significant portion of the room destroyed.

rooms.description: A shower block where the main battle took place. The room is wrecked and features low gravity.  Intruders and dead soldiers float around.
rooms.image_prompt: A wrecked spaceship shower block in zero gravity. Bodies of soldiers and strange humanoid creatures float around, some with horrific injuries.  Water droplets and blood are suspended in the air. The walls are damaged, and there's a hole leading to space.
rooms.name: Shower Block
rooms.canon_event: The shower block is the location of a brutal, zero-gravity battle.  Alien intruders, described as amphibian-like creatures, emerge from a pressure-sealed membrane in the wall.  A firefight ensues between the intruders and Sol Guards, resulting in widespread carnage and destruction.  The battle ends with the intruders escaping through a breach in the hull.

rooms.description: A long hallway connecting different areas of the ship.  Features dead bodies and signs of combat.
rooms.image_prompt: A long spaceship corridor with blood splatter and corpses of soldiers floating in zero gravity. The walls are damaged with signs of fire damage and broken equipment.
rooms.name: Hallway 1
rooms.canon_event: The hallway (Hallway 1) is the site of a fierce battle between Sol Guards and the alien intruders.  Numerous dead Sol Guards are strewn about, many impaled by the intruders’ spears.  The intruders, moving with ease in the zero-gravity environment, utilize their weapons to devastating effect.  The fight continues down the hallway, pushing the survivors further along.

rooms.description: A grav-lift station where the group encountered more hostiles. The battle reaches a peak here.
rooms.image_prompt: A futuristic spaceship grav-lift station with soldiers in heavy armor fighting large, humanoid creatures in zero gravity. Blue light illuminates the scene, and weapons fire is visible.
rooms.name: GravLift Station
rooms.canon_event: A fierce battle takes place in the grav-lift station.  Alien intruders, wielding spears and axes, attack Sol Guards.  Zero gravity ensues, resulting in chaotic, airborne combat.  The intruders’ weapons and the Sol Guards' energy blasts fill the room with flashing light and the sounds of gunfire and screams.  One particularly large intruder, the "Volsung Fá," slaughters several guards before Volga and the narrator escape.

rooms.description: A maintenance corridor with a manual transit chute.  Shows the aftermath of combat and a path to escape.
rooms.image_prompt: A dark spaceship maintenance corridor with signs of intense combat: blood spatter, broken equipment, and dead bodies of soldiers. A chute leading down between levels is visible.
rooms.name: Maintenance Corridor
rooms.canon_event: In this maintenance corridor,  Fig, Volga, and the narrator flee the pursuing Ascomanni.  The corridor is littered with the corpses of Sol Guards, and  a manual transit chute offers a means of escape.  Fig uses her retinal implant to access a hidden escape craft.

rooms.description: A quiet pilot ready room, suggesting a hasty escape by the pilots. An emergency escape craft is found here.
rooms.image_prompt: A spaceship pilot ready room, slightly disheveled, with empty lockers and a sense of haste. A passage to an emergency escape craft is revealed.
rooms.name: Pilot Ready Room
rooms.canon_event: In the pilot ready room, Volga discovers and confronts Figment, leading to a tense standoff and the revelation of Figment's nanotech emergency defense system (NEDS).  Volga attacks Figment, and a struggle ensues, only ending when the protagonist intervenes.  The room is then used as a staging point for the escape using a hidden emergency escape craft.
